name: I got STICKY with a FEMBOY
name_original: I got STICKY with a FEMBOY
description:
Male on Femboy

One night you decide to try your luck by sliding into a femboy content creator's DMs. One night later and the date is set. A short drive to the next town over and your heart is pounding in your chest, as you sit and wait in your car outside his front gate. A few minutes later and he's touching your thigh, asking you if you know how to work a camera...

Oh fuck, your underpants are already sticky... 😏

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay
  • Kinetic Visual Novel
  • H-Scenes
  • ~4K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.
